destinations.name: Bora Bora, French Polynesia
destinations.description: A tropical paradise known for its turquoise lagoons, overwater bungalows, and volcanic landscapes.

topDestinations.name: Matira Beach
topDestinations.description: A stunning public beach with soft sand and calm waters.

topDestinations.name: Mount Otemanu
topDestinations.description: A majestic volcanic peak offering breathtaking views.

thingsToDo.name: Snorkeling
thingsToDo.description: Explore vibrant coral reefs and marine life.

thingsToDo.name: Shark Feeding Tours
thingsToDo.description: An adventurous excursion to see sharks up close.

hotels.name: Four Seasons Resort Bora Bora
hotels.description: Luxury overwater bungalows with stunning views.

hotels.name: Conrad Bora Bora Nui
hotels.description: A high-end resort with infinity pools and private beaches.

destinations.name: Tokyo, Japan
destinations.description: A bustling metropolis blending tradition and modernity.

topDestinations.name: Senso-ji Temple
topDestinations.description: Tokyo's oldest temple with stunning architecture.

thingsToDo.name: Sushi Tasting
thingsToDo.description: Enjoy authentic sushi at local restaurants.

thingsToDo.name: Cherry Blossom Viewing
thingsToDo.description: Experience the beauty of sakura in spring.

hotels.name: Park Hyatt Tokyo
hotels.description: A luxury hotel with panoramic city views.

destinations.name: Angkor Wat, Cambodia
destinations.description: A UNESCO World Heritage site and the largest religious monument in the world.

topDestinations.name: Bayon Temple
topDestinations.description: Famous for its smiling stone faces.

thingsToDo.name: Sunrise Tour
thingsToDo.description: Watch the sunrise over the ancient ruins.
